item.title: A junction box is needed, 17th September
item.description:
To the attention of Southwark Council: A junction box is needed here because Tower Bridge Road is free from the congestion charge, so all the cars traveling to the east side are using Tower Bridge Road. This is causing heavy traffic. If someone wants to go from Great Dover Street to Old Kent Road, it is almost impossible to pass this junction. Please, someone, look into this matter.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bricklayers Arms Roundabout, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction box needed in elephant and castle, 17th September
item.description:
Dear Southwark Council, I would like to bring to your attention some urgent traffic issues in the Elephant and Castle area. A few additional yellow box junctions are needed to improve traffic flow. One is required at the junction of Newington Causeway and Elephant and Castle. Another is needed between London Road and Elephant and Castle. At present, vehicles turning from London Road towards New Kent Road often block traffic coming from Newington Causeway, making it extremely difficult for cars to pass through towards the Kennington Park side. I kindly request that the Council urgently review this matter, as it would greatly help to ease congestion and improve safety in the area. Thank you for your attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elephant and Castle, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
